Name: Rum Barrel (by Donn Beach)
Glass: Rum barrel mug or pint glass
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
60 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rum barrel mug or pint glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & mint sprig.
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: A foamy head hides a tasty (and be warned) rum laced, tangy fruity drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Ernest Raymond Beaumont-Gantt, A.K.A. Don The Beachcomber at his bar in Hollywood, California, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Rum Barrel (by Donn Beach) contains 493 calories
